anathema: Kill or abuse a house cat, abandon a child, choose to marry
edict: Learn secrets, tempt others into revelry, kill harmful snakes and evil spirits, heal diseases
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Bastet (The Sly Enchantress)](/Deities.aspx?ID=632)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 6

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Learn secrets, tempt others into revelry, kill harmful snakes and evil spirits, heal diseases

**Anathema** Kill or abuse a house cat, abandon a child, choose to marry

**Area of Concern**
Cats, pleasure, secrets

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

**Favored Weapon** [claw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) or [Tekko-Kagi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=304)

**Domains** [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Pest Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1626)
(cats only)

- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=1963)

- **4th**
[Peaceful Bubble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1624)

</column>
name: Bastet (The Sly Enchantress)
